name: Scenes and Sites
description:
"Scenes and Sites" is a surreal walkthrough game where the viewer moves through various environments. Disorientation reigns,  body schema becomes warped, and the player finds extension in a new materiality.  

Play with headphones if available. Game time ~20 min.

This game was created over the summer of 2019 with the support of Concordia University's Undergraduate Student Research granting program, with the invaluable supervision and advice of Pippin Barr.

@_vrtual_boi
